name: konstantin-budylov/protobuff-test
description: Protocol Buffers definitions for our services

post-install-cmd: bash -c 'if command -v protoc &> /dev/null; then protoc --php_out=./src --grpc_out=./src --plugin=protoc-gen-grpc=$(which grpc_php_plugin) -I=./proto ./proto/*.proto; else echo "protoc not found, skipping code generation"; fi'
